SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class VirtualClient

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.VirtualClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventHandler, Listener, ModelChangeEventHandler
public class VirtualClient extends Object implements ModelChangeEventHandler
This class represents the Client in the Server. For each client connected the server has an instance of this object
